text: Please click on one of the answer options
If you decide to go to the Corona ambulance of Charité, please show the following QR code, which will speed up your registration:

Currently, you don't need to do anything, since:

- you didn't have contact to a verified case
- you haven't been in a risk region with frequent SARS-COV2 cases
- and you don't have symptoms.
Please carefully take hand hygiene into consideration.

If you develop symptoms of a cold in the next couple of days, please contact the hotline of the Senate Department for Health (Tel. 030/9028 28 28) or one of the Coronavirus ambulances.

If you decide to go to the Coronavirus ambulance of the Charité, please show the following QR Code to speed up your registration process:

Please immediately contact your local health department or call the hotline of the Senate Department for Health (Tel. 030/9028 28 28).
Please avoid contact to other people and stay at home, if possible.
If you need to leave home: Please keep a distance of at least 2 meters to other persons, do not touch anything and try to correctly cough and sneeze without affecting persons. If you develop symptoms of a cold in the next couple of days, please contact the hotline of the Senate Department for Health (Tel. 030/9028 28 28) or one of the Coronavirus ambulances.

If you decide to go to the Coronavirus ambulance of the Charité, please show the following QR Code to speed up your registration process:

Please immediately contact your local health department or call the hotline of the Senate Department for Health (Tel. 030/9028 28 28).
Please save the below QR Code and show it at the Coronavirus ambulance (currently, scanning of the QR Code is only possible at Charité).
If you need to leave home: Please keep a distance of at least 2 meters to other persons, do not touch anything and try to correctly cough and sneeze without affecting persons.
